_comment: Add a _ before an option name to comment it out and it wont be added to the apworld
Using 'goal' as the name of an option let you override some of the generated goal parameters
goal.description: How to End your Randomized playthrough.

description: Set this to true if you want a bunch of individual lootable crates/barrels/chests added to the pool as location checks.
To compensate for check count, this will also add a bunch of filler potions and scrolls to the item pool.
Note that your Lockpicking ability is NOT accounted for at this time. Progression may be locked behind a locked chest and it's up to you to get past it.
Set this to true if instead of EVERY lootable as a check, you'd rather have 'loot x room' as checks.
This is more balanced than full lootsanity and easier to track. Lockpicking ability is not required.
